ygData.subject: Extreme defeated
ygData.msgSnippet: First, I beat tevfifty with my illegitimate team.  Darn, I had to use Battle (not Slaughter) level against the next to last scenario. Then, I finally beat my

First, I beat tevfifty with my illegitimate team.  Darn, I had to use 
Battle (not Slaughter) level against the next to last scenario. Then, 
I finally beat my own extreme level with a team.

I am going to show the stats before the team won in the same
alignment 
as it is when you view the team:  Most of the illegitimate part was 
raising money to boost up the stats on the mage.
cleric1    230  230  230  410  230  39
cleric2    230  230  230  410  230  41
archmage   253  253  253  410  253  50
mage       290  290  290  480  290  42

final stats:  the archmage (summoned all the fire elementals) ended
up 
at experience level 72 and cleric1 (summoned most of the undead)
ended 
up at experience level 44.  I ended up with roughly 3 million dollars.

I kept getting an error message about Weapon 44 when running my 
scenario.  Can anybody from FSGames tell me what that error message 
concerns?  I want the scenario to run without error messages.

Now, I will start working on my own levels.  Beware, everyone of the 
scenarios will be tough.

BTW, Moderator, may I upload the zipped version of my scenarios (when 
I am finished) to the files section of this egroup?
